component.attributes:
&data_component_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
paginator false java.lang.Boolean false Enables paginator, default value is false
paginatorTemplate false java.lang.String Template for the paginator layout, default value is "{FirstPageLink} {PreviousPageLink} {PageLinks} {NextPageLink} {LastPageLink}"
rowsPerPageTemplate false java.lang.String Template for the rowsPerPage dropdown, default value is "25,50,100"
currentPageReportTemplate false java.lang.String Template for the {currentPageReport} UI.
paginatorAlwaysVisible false java.lang.Boolean true Defines if paginator should be hidden when number of rows displayed is less than paginator rowsPerPage option.
scrollable false java.lang.Boolean false Controls scrolling, default value is false
width false java.lang.Integer java.lang.Integer.MIN_VALUE
Width of a datatable
height false java.lang.Integer java.lang.Integer.MIN_VALUE
Height of a datatable
firstPageLinkLabel false java.lang.String
Label of the first link paginator
previousPageLinkLabel false java.lang.String
Label of the previous link paginator
nextPageLinkLabel false java.lang.String
Label of the next link paginator
lastPageLinkLabel false java.lang.String
Label of the last link paginator
selectionMode false java.lang.String
Type for row click selection, can be 'multiple' and 'single'.
selection false java.lang.Object
Reference that'll be used to assign the selected data.
dynamic false java.lang.Boolean false
When set to true sorting and paging will be done on server via ajax, default is false meaning sorting-paging is done on client side.
lazy false java.lang.Boolean false
Controls lazy loading.
rowIndexVar false java.lang.String
Variable name referring to the rowIndex being processed.
paginatorPosition false java.lang.String both
Position of the paginator, valid values are "both","top","bottom".
emptyMessage false java.lang.String No records found.
Message to be shown when there're no records to display.
errorMessage false java.lang.String
Message to be shown when there's an error loading the data.
loadingMessage false java.lang.String
Message to be shown when loading the data with ajax.
sortAscMessage false java.lang.String
Message to be shown to sort a column data in ascending order.
sortDescMessage false java.lang.String
Message to be shown to sort a column data in descending order.
update false java.lang.String
Component(s) to be updated after ajax row selection. Deprecated use onRowSelectUpdate instead.
onRowSelectUpdate false java.lang.String
Component(s) to be updated after ajax row selection.
rowSelectListener false javax.el.MethodExpression java.lang.String rowSelectListener(org.primefaces.event.SelectEvent) Server side listener to invoke when a row is selected in instant selection mode.
rowUnselectListener false javax.el.MethodExpression java.lang.String rowUnselectListener(org.primefaces.event.UnselectEvent) Server side listener to invoke when a row is unselected in instant selection mode.
onRowUnselectUpdate false java.lang.String
Component(s) to be updated after ajax row unselection.
style false java.lang.String Style of the main container element of table.
styleClass false java.lang.String StyleClass of the main container element of table.
onselectStart false java.lang.String
Javascript event handler to be called before ajax request for instant ajax row selection request begins. Deprecated use onRowSelectStart instead.
onselectComplete false java.lang.String
Javascript event handler to be called after ajax request for instant ajax row selection request is completed. Deprecated use onRowSelectComplete instead.
onRowSelectStart false java.lang.String
Javascript event handler to be called before ajax request for instant ajax row selection request begins.
onRowSelectComplete false java.lang.String
Javascript event handler to be called after ajax request for instant ajax row selection request is completed.
dblClickSelect false java.lang.Boolean false
By default single click triggers row selection feature, setting dblClickSelect enabled double click requirement for row selection.
page false java.lang.Integer 1 Index of the current page, first page is 1.
pageLinks false java.lang.Integer 10 Number of pageLinks to display when paginator is enabled, defaults to 10.
liveScroll false java.lang.Boolean false Enables loading of data during scrolling.
rowStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class for rows.
